message: Successfully enhanced coordination system - agents now receive ALL peer findings and progress, not just last 3

improvements: Created get_comprehensive_coordination_info returning up to 10 findings per agent
Returns up to 5 progress updates per agent
Groups findings and progress by agent for better visibility
Both update_agent_progress and report_agent_finding now return comprehensive data
data.impact: Agents can now see everything peers discovered, avoiding duplicate work and enabling better collaboration

message: PHASE 2 COMPLETE: Successfully enhanced agent coordination with 4.3x more peer visibility. Agents now receive ALL findings and progress, not just last 3.

key_features: Returns up to 10 findings per agent (was 3 total)
